hero.brief: I'm a passionate frontend developer with over 20 years of experience in building modern web applications. I love creating beautiful, accessible, and performant user interfaces that make a difference.

experience.title: Senior Frontend Developer
experience.description: Maintaining and enhancing the legacy checkout platform using React PWA and federated modules (React + Svelte). Contributed to the migration to a modern platform using module federation. Led GDPR compliance and cookie management efforts, promoted coding best practices, and implemented accessibility standards (EN 301 549, WCAG 2.0).

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Worked on the Core Platform team improving architecture and developer experience. Led the transition to micro frontends and optimized development workflows for better DX.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
experience.description: Led migration of the product page from legacy stack to Vue.js with SSR and Kafka-powered A/B testing. Designed APIs and ensured feature stability during the transition.

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer
experience.description: Defined stack, architecture, coding standards and led the frontend team. Delivered platforms like Vodafone IoT and auction testing tools.

experience.title: Senior Frontend Developer

experience.title: Front End Tech Leader
